sources.title: Secrets of a Co-Ed
sources.description: The daughter of the city's most prominent lawyer loves the city's biggest gangster.

metadata.Plot: A free-spirited college girl insists on carrying on her romance with a young mobster, scandalizing the town and going against the wishes of her father, the town's most prominent attorney--and who has his own reasons for not wanting to attract too much attention to him and his family.
metadata.Actors: Otto Kruger, Tina Thayer, Rick Vallin
